p: Above all, the international community must recognize that principle of reciprocity formalized by Upshur and also acknowledged by WHO (WHO 2016, 30), providing continuous support—scientific, economic, logistical and human—to the communities affected by this pandemic. Recognizing the principle of reciprocity and writing policies based on it will not have the same symbolic power as bringing food to a place with romantic charm like the Mompesson well, but I do not see how this could reduce its validity.
